text: Peter Bernstein (born April 10, 1951) is an American movie score composer. == Early life == Bernstein was born in New York City to Elmer Bernstein and Pearl Glusman. He was raised Jewish. == Personal life == Bernstein married Marilyn Meadows and had a son Joshua Bernstein.
